title: lost all of email box and just have "inbox" and "deleted items"
content:

title: Message displays msg source
content: When I select a message, the message source is displayed above the message text. How do I turn it offf so that only the message text is displayed?

title: Thunderbird no longer connecting to gmail account
content: Tried all suggestions on re connecting thunderbird to gmail with no success. The new authorisation used by google is not working. I have thunderbird installed on Linux mint. Since i cannot use thunderbird i have moved to Evolution email client which has no problem at all connecting to gmail.

title: "Could not be compacted" error on TB 139
content: Long-time user here. A month or so ago I switched from 128 esr to 139 release, and since then I have had constant messaging several times a day that folders could nor be compacted. I've verified everything, but the message still happens with annoying regularity. I saw on Reddit that this may be a known bug, but thought I would report it to the forum anyway. Hope that it will be resolved in the next release.
creator: asmwent
